title: Rippling | SDE-2 | Bangalore, India | Offer
content:
Education: B.Tech in CS (Tier 1)
Years of Experience: 4.6 years
Prior Experience: SDE II equivalent in an Investment Banking Company
Current Base : INR 32LPA (CTC: 53L)
Competing offer: Base: 40LPA + ESOP: 8 L
Company: Rippling
Title: SDE-II
Location: Bengaluru, Hybrid
Base Salary: INR 50 LPA
Signing Bonus : INR 7L
Stocks (ESOPs) : USD 78,000 (for 4 years, 1 year cliff)

Rejected because did not hear good things about the culture and work from their ex-employees. Read about lot of Amazon managers joined here in the past 2 years making the workplace toxic.

Interview Experience - https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/5281461/rippling-sde-2-bangalore-india-4-june-2024-offer/2460365

title: Offers | Indian Startups
content:
Education: Tier-1 college
Years of Experience: 2 YOE + 6 month internship
Prior Experience: Flipkart
Current Compensation : 28 Lakh (20 Base +2-4 Perf Bonus + 4 Stocks)

Offer 1 : 
Date of the Offer: June 2024
Company: Quizizz
Title/Level: L3(Flat Hierarchy)
Location: Bangalore
Base salary: 30 Lakhs INR
Signing Bonus: 3 Lakhs INR
Retention Bonus : 3 Lakhs INR
Stock bonus: 20000 USD vested 25% each year for 4 year ~ 4L per year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 37 Lakh per year

Offer 2 : 
Date of the Offer: June 2024
Company: Narvar
Title/Level: SDE 2
Location: Bangalore
Base salary: 30 Lakhs INR
Signing Bonus: 3 Lakhs INR
Performance Bonus : 3 Lakhs INR
Stock bonus: 25000 USD vested 25% each year for 4 year ~ 5L per year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 41 Lakh per year


P.S- Will be promoting to SDE2 at Flipkart by September , post which my CTC at Flipkart would be in a similar range. However , the cash at Flipkart won't be this high. 
Anyone who has worked in these 2 companies , can you share your experience? I want to join young startups and work in them atleast for the next 4-5 years. I thought the scale and kind of problems at Narvar are way better than what Quizizz is solving and have an inclination towards them. However,  there are mixed reviews about them on the Internet.

title: Offer Evaluation | Mercari India MG2 (SSE) Frontend | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech in IT from Tier 3 College
Years of Experience: 3+ Years
Prior Experience: US Based Startup
Date of the Offer: June 2024
Company: Mercari (Japan's First Unicorn)
Title/Level: MG2 (similar to SDE2/SSE)  
Location: Bangalore
Salary: ₹24.5 Lakh (including 50k gratuity)
Joining Bonus: 1 Lakh
Performance Bonus - 2.2 Lakh
Total comp (Salary + Joining Bonus + Performance Bonus): ~₹27.7 Lakh

Benefits: 
	1. Cult Elite Membership
	2. Internet Bill - INR 3,500 per month
	3. Medical Insurance for employee including parents

18 Earned Leaves + 12 Sick/Casual Leaves

How is this offer according to my experience and current market situation? Am i lowballed? Should i continue my search for better pay than this?
